sense.def:
Govorec ali pisec uporablja izraz
myself
kot predmet glagola ali predloga v stavku, v katerem je osebek
I
ali
me
predhodni predmet.

seg.quote: If you do not help me, I will kill myself.
I was thoroughly ashamed of myself.
I poured myself a small drink.

sense.def:
Myself
se uporablja tudi, če hočemo poudariti osebek ali predmet v prvi osebi.

seg.quote: I myself feel that Muriel Spark is very underrated.
I find it a bit odd myself.

sense.def:
Govorec ali pisec uporablja besedo
myself
tudi v izrazih kot
I did it myself
, ko hoče povedati, da je nekaj naredil sam, brez vsakršne pomoči ali vmešavanja drugih.
